These offer a lot more comfort, and stay better than the original ones. The different options, like noise cancellation, works great! We loved these so much my wife got a pair shortly after to replace her AirPods. If you can afford the increased price I highly recommend getting these.

data.title: Excellent sound and more options than the first version of Apple EarPods Pro v2
data.body: Excellent sound and more options than the first version of Apple EarPods Pro and well worth it. Noise cancellation is amazing and many other options. The best Earbuds on the market with the best noise cancellation, background noise reduction and the.crystal clear sounds you are listening too. Much easier to answer/end calls, easier to turn up/down volume, and turn on Noise reduction all from headphones. So no more using phone to turn up or turn on features. Plus they come with 4 pairs of earbuds covers to it fit YOUR ears properly and don‚Äôt come out. You can also charge with provided

data.title: Amazing the Apple Ecosystem from a lifelong Android Loser.
data.body: Mind Blown! w/ my new 15promax I got these and a series 9 , the sound and features are next level ! I always had an android but this spatial audio is so cool üòé I never liked how previous earbuds üëÇ fit but I literally can lay down comfortably with their unique design and listen üé∂ . Someone said symphony in your ears, yes that's about accurate.

data.title: Oh boy, these are wonderful!
data.body: Easily the best earbuds I've ever owned (even better than my beloved Bose ones from back in the day), not that I'm at all surprised. The noise cancellation is like nothing I've ever experienced, and I can't wait to wear them on an airplane. Easy to use, instantly paired to my phone, work like a dream. I love the fact that the volume of the content I'm playing automatically drops when I talk. I love them beyond all reason.

data.title: Definite improvement over Airpods Pro 1st gen.
data.body: I like the first AirPods Pro set I bought a couple years ago, especially once I figured out how to turn on noise cancellation. I bought these USB-C 2nd gen. on sale from Amazon because I'd read that the noise cancellation was even better, plus most of my electronics now use USB-C so I wanted to standardize it all. I have not been disappointed in the quality of the noise cancellation or the sound, although I mostly listen to podcasts with them rather than music. I get a good fit from the interchangeable ear cushions. I kept my old Airpods Pro as a backup.

data.title: If You‚Äôre On The Fence, JUST DO IT!
data.body: I upgraded from the AirPod pro 1st gen 2 months ago, and there has yet to be a day where I‚Äôve regretted my decision in buying them. I‚Äôm 14yrs old and I didn‚Äôt know if it would be wise for me to spend so much money on something that I already (sort of) had. I was on thinking about buying them for a long time, but when cyber Monday rolled around, and they were $50 cheaper than normal, I decided that if I didn‚Äôt like them I can always just return them! These earbuds are a must have for apple users. Siri is an amazing feature on these buds, along with the swipe noise control, find my feature, and noise cancelation. If you‚Äôre unsure if you should buy these or not, just know that you will most likely end up using them everyday, and if you don‚Äôt like them, RETURNS ARE FREE!

data.title: Much better than I expected
data.body:
I'm an audiophile, which (among other things) means I don't mind wires on my audio gear. But when Amazon dropped the price of these to $189 (lowest ever to that point), I decided to give these a try. I had some wireless buds from Tin Hifi, and the AirPods are step up.

Pros: Great audio quality (I suspect there is some software wizardry at work here, as they sound better than they have any right to), noise cancelling (with different options to choose from), seamless connection with iPhone, iPad, and Apple TV, good battery life.

Cons: Small ear tips. I was able to work around this, and this concern probably won't apply to all. I have a really big right ear hole, and the largest tips that came with the AirPods were still not big enough. I got an adapter on Etsy, with which I can use my own eartips. Problem solved. Seal and comfort are great.

data.title: BRO-In-Law loves them!
data.body: I purchased these for my BRO-In-Law for Christmas & he LOVES them! To be honest, we're not "Apple" fans, especially when it comes to sound (Bose is by far superior, Imo!) But, they're that crazy "Apple" everything family & my Niece & Nephews are also raving about how comfortable his new Air Pods are. My sister really likes them too, she has Apple's latest edition & said hers suck compared to these!?

data.title: Not Cross Compatible with Lightning Pro Gen2
data.body: I have had all versions of the AirPod Pro‚Äôs. My AirPod Pro Gen.2 with MagSafe Case and lightning connector sound better. Doesn‚Äôt make since to me but these AirPod Pro Gen.2 with MagSafe Case and USB-C connector just don‚Äôt hit like the last pair. Also, I really just wanted to buy these to replace the left side of the other that I lost, but when you mismatch them in the cases you get a popup that tells you they ARE NOT cross compatible due to how the charging functions. So I will probably send these back.

data.title: Good but not great.
data.body:
So these are good. And if you are an Iphone user these babies are a good match for the ecosystem. Outside of that they are not as great as many people think. Maybe for the status symbol only.

BOSE and Sony have better ANC, B&W have better sound, and budget ANC earbuds like 1More are an overall great.

With that being said, these are very comfortable, and they stay in place. I did workout with them and they never moved.

Would i recomend, only if you are getting it for the ecosystem. But there are better choices out there.

data.title: Best earbuds I‚Äôve ever had
data.body: Before using these AirPods I was using the Powerbeats pro which had zero noise canceling capabilities so that may have made this upgrade a little more impactful for me. I LOVE these earbuds, the noise canceling is very good and the sound quality is amazing. I feel like both of these work hand in hand to create a pretty awesome listening experience. I honestly feel like I have been able to hear little beats and melodies in my music I didn‚Äôt notice before. Another thing that makes these earbuds an experience is the Spatial Audio that features with Apple Music. I really just feel like I‚Äôm wearing/listening to something that is truly unique. I honestly can‚Äôt imagine any headphones or earbuds being better than this. This feels like the peak of what a good headphone/earbud is capable of. I honestly just love them. Highly recommend! They are worth the price tag

data.title: The Noise Cancelling Is Crazy
data.body: I love these especially the noise cancelling feature. My roommate was playing music in his room. I put these in to play music so I wouldn't hear his music. Before I started my music I realized that I couldn't hear his music anymore. I took the earbuds out and his music was still playing. Put them back in and I couldn't hear his music. Amazing! Sound quality is good. Battery life seems good. I hope they last longer than a year. My old apple earbuds died after a year. They were the regular kind though, not the pro.

data.title: Pros outweigh cons
data.body:
Noise cancellation was so great outdoors that I was confused when i first tried. I was not aware that n.c. tech was so good. It was weird.

With Apple Music free trial, I also marvrled at ‚Äúspatial audio‚Äù versions of instrumental jazz. I kept flipping my head left and right to feel how the airpods track me.

But I arranged for a return because the microphone performance was poor: callers had trouble hearing me through the airpods when I was outdoors. Also, connectivity was not 100%: sometimes audio would cut out abruptly for no apparent reason.

But then I watched a prime video on ipad with airpods. The sound was clear, dramatic, like being in the theater. And this was just a tv show, not a movie, that i was watching. I was so impressed. I canceled the return.

data.title: Great quality
data.body: I use AirPods primarily for speaking on the phone while driving for work. My colleagues tell me they can hear me clearly and can‚Äôt even tell that I‚Äôm driving as they hear no background noise. The quality on my end for both phone calls and listening to music. If I am listening to music and I begin to speak the volume immediately lowers. I am very happy with this purchase.

data.title: Great product
data.body: Finally sucked it up and bought the airpods instead of cheap $30 earbuds, totally worth it. The connection to my iPhone is immediate and the sound is pretty good. I like the little features Apple has implemented like being able to have a conversation with someone without taking the ear pods out. I like how I can track and find missing ear pods case and the ear pods them selves.

data.title: Great sound
data.body: These AirPods have excellent sound. It is my first pair of AirPods so I can‚Äôt compare them to previous generations, but they sound better than my off brand earbuds I pair $30 for. I must say I tend to use my shockz headphones a little bit more so I can hear what‚Äôs around me, and not have all outside noise cancelled out. The sound quality is superior on the AirPods though.

data.title: Still awesome!
data.body: I‚Äôve purchased three pairs of these for various family members. I finally got myself a pair after trying out someone else‚Äôs and falling in love with them. And since I got them on sale this time, it was very nice. Considering how rare that is, I was very happy. The sound quality is so much better and they come with three ear plug sizes that snap onto the ear piece. There are so many more functions than with the original AirPods. I like these a lot and will never go back. My favorite component is how comfortable they are!!

data.title: Meets exceeds expectations
data.body: I got these for my son for his birthday and he loves them. He says he can put them on when his sister is being annoying and tone her out. He uses them at the gym lifting and never had any issues falling out. I'm glad I paid the extra money for these with the rubber tips. He has nothing bad to say it was worth every penny.

data.title: Sound great and fit comfortably
data.body: I like these AirPods better than I thought I would. They also fit comfortably and don't hurt when wearing for extended time. I really like the way they interface with the app on the iPhone. Everything you need is at your finger tips! They sound great and noise cancellation is nice, but the Bose QuietComfort earbuds have noticeably better noise reduction and were even a bit more comfortable. As this is an Apple product, these AirPods worked better with the app and give more app options and controls than Bose.

data.title: Always like the Earpods Pro - this is an upgrade
data.body:
For some reason, they still call these "2nd generation" but with USB-C, rather than third generation.

I got these when my previous "2nd gen" stopped working.

These seem like a fairly nice upgrade. The noise cancellation, and the sound, seem better (?), even though Apple does not call this a new generation ...

Regardless, AirPods Pro are awesome in general, and these are highly recommended.

data.title: THEY STAY IN MY EARS FINALLY!
data.body: The noise cancellation really drowns out the kids! I can‚Äôt hear anything but my music and podcasts! I had the AirPods from the previous gen. But these are even better. it comes with different size fittings for your ear which I really liked since I have small ears, and my old AirPods kept falling out. These are amazing, and they stay in my ears through a sweaty workout. I also cleaned the entire house without any disruption and was able to answer my calls without touching my phone‚Ä¶ which is the point. I highly recommend!

data.title: I'm blown away - my new favorite earbuds!
data.body: I've used all sorts of TWE wireless buds over the years, but I having never owned and iPhone or anything within the Apple ecosystem until more recently, I never had a compelling reason to look into the AirPods. Having recently switched to the new iPhone 15 Pro Max and Watch Ultra 2 I thought I would take these for a spin on the $189 Black Friday deal. Oh my gosh am I glad I did! These have a very natural sound to them, and really are perfect all-around good ear buds. If I'm consuming media or listening to music these are very good - not perfect in this department, but they are VERY good and have a very balanced sound and great sound stage. These buds are literally second to none in terms of ANC and call/speech clarity. The ANC is the best I've heard in any earbuds - which is also better than the new Sony XM5's in my opinion. Call clarity and speech coming through these things is also second to no other buds I've heard. These are just so good! Then you throw in the added bonus of how seamlessly these integrate with my new phone and watch... I've been missing out not having had this trio until now. I've ascended to a new technological level. I would gladly pay full price for these - but if you can get them on a deal, don't hesitate, just do it.

data.title: It will fit in a kids ear
data.body: My daughter received these for Christmas from Santa. She likes them. The sound quality is really good. However i do own a pair of the sony XM3, and Santa brought my wife a pair of XM5's. They have better sound quality than the air pods do. The battery life so far has been fine. Time will tell on that. The sony earbuds are more expensive, and Santa was unsure if they would fit into my daughter's ears so he got her the airpods. They do come with three seperate sized inserts. The smallest ones fit her ears. She is 8. One other item to know is these are charged with a USB-C connector cable. It does not come with a power block, so if you don't have a USB-C power block better grab one of those.

data.title: Best earphones I‚Äôve ever owned
data.body:
The first generation were great. The second generation blows them away. Just the added volume controls on the stem are worth the upgrade. On top of that, the upgraded noise cancellation is almost miraculous. On an airplane, I could hear my movie perfectly clear without the engines noise in the background.

If you have an iPhone, iPad or Apple TV, GET THESE. You‚Äôll be happy you did.

data.title: 3rd Pair
data.body: It seems like yearly I have to get new airpods. I use them daily and by the end of the year, I hear static. But these are newer and now have the C - C-charging port. I haven't had any problems this far. Everything is working great. I love these since they have a longer battery, I can use them for up to 6 hours until one of the pods dies.

data.title: WORTH IT
data.body: They work perfectly fine and there‚Äôre much cheaper here. From the apple website there‚Äôre about 250. now you wouldn‚Äôt wanna buy that, amazon got youuu‚ÄºÔ∏è‚ÄºÔ∏è The noise cancellation is reallll, and you‚Äôre able to locate your airpods by how far it is from you. To me that is theee best part, plus it‚Äôs just like the airtag, it does that too. THESE ARE DEFINITELY WORTH IT THOUGH, EVERYONE‚ÄºÔ∏è‚ÄºÔ∏è‚ÄºÔ∏è

data.title: Wow what technology
data.body: Ordered first pair and the never arrived. Amazon sent replacement next day. Holy moly i thought it was all hype but I was ever so wrong. These buds are something else. The custom features are phenomenal. Sound quality paramount. Noise suppression is great. When I first put them in at gym I couldn‚Äôt hear anything! Mouse fart quiet!Not much more to say really impressive ear buds. They would be great if they could be used for shooting sports. Would definitely recommend.

data.title: Easy to adapt
data.body:
I decided to upgrade from my 1st generation apple earbuds. What a difference! Most of the time I had to go to settings when using my IPad to switch them on. The gen 2 pro just switches on between my iPhone or IPad it‚Äôs so easy, no need to go to settings!
Great sound quality of course!
Long battery life, no more charging one earpiece at a time when using them for too long.
Should have bought these earlier!
Only drawback is one time delivery code that amazon requires. I almost cancelled the delivery it was so complicated getting the package. I understand that they want to make sure you get your order but it is a frustrating experience with the driver. I had to contact Amazon twice to sort it out! Having it delivered at a secure box may be best.

data.title: Great sound
data.body: For me the only difference is that it has a usb c connection, they sound great but so did the one with the lightning connection, they are really nice though, I got them on sale here at Amazon, so I didn‚Äôt pay the Apple Store price, so unless you really just have to have the newer connection, don‚Äôt buy, they are exactly the same to me.

data.title: New standard in noise cancelling ear buds
data.body:
Love these wireless ear buds. Great product but that was to be expected. A joy to open (like most every apple product). Exceeds my expectations for quality, connection and ease of use. Looking forward to using these on an airplane in a couple of weeks.

Airpods Pro are my go to for headphones. Love using them for phone calls and how easily I can switch between my iPhone and my mac mini computer without much hassle at all. Battery life has been excellent and the USB-C charging is an upgrade over previous generations.

data.title: Superior in every way
data.body: I‚Äôm not one to go out of my way to push an apple product. These AirPods, however, are superior to much of the competition at a fraction of the cost. They offer an experience identical to that of the AirPods Max without being overly intrusive or heavy like the headphones. As someone who gave up their original AirPods for constantly falling out, these are the ultimate solution. The listening experience and user friendliness are enthralling; Apple has really knocked it out of the park with this one without charging an absurdly high price.

data.title: Excellent noise cancellation
data.body: I've used 2nd Generation AirPods for a while. These are a huge improvement in both sound and functionality. Once you get a comfortable fit from the included ear tips, the noise cancellation, transparency mode and Spatial Audio are superb. These are easily worth the extra cost, though it helps to catch them on sale, as they have been often over the last three months.

data.title: They protect my hearing in extreme decibel situations!
data.body:
I bought them to wear when going to hear dance/rock'n'roll bands. Their dB levels often exceed 106 dB.
I have hyper sensitivity and earplugs don't work. I am thrilled that I can sit up front or be on the dance floor with no pain. Calms any distortions.
My only disappointment? I wish they came in black color (the white color competes with my pretty earrings!)

data.title: Unbelievable noise canceling and great sound
data.body:
I was shocked at how incredible these AirPods Are. I suffer from hearing loss and sometimes wear hearing aids. My biggest problem is in environments where all the sounds become simply noise to me. Restaurants, our local tavern and gym are examples.
These AirPods are like magic. They cancel virtually all the ‚Äúnoise‚Äù. However they do not cancel the speech of those around me.
They charge in the case and Bluetooth to anything you want including my car.
They are also the best sounding music earbuds I have ever had.

data.title: Great Buy.
data.body: I prefer Sony and Bose buds, but my wife prefers Apple buds. She's had these for two months and is still in love with them. I know when she has them in because she can't hear me due to it's impressive noise cancelling. That or she's just ignoring me...you never know. I would purchase these again for her should something happen to these. üëç

data.title: Scratchy noises
data.body:
I like the AirPods for the most part. I'm not an audiophile but I think it sounds good playing music and podcasts. Obviously, not as good as my over-the-ear headphones of similar price. When you put it into noise cancellation mode, it works well. The environmental noise is almost completely gone except for those really loud noises you will get living in a city. The difference is apparent when you go out of noise cancellation and the environmental noises flood back in.

I wish they gave us a backup for the ear tips for each size. I am hopeful that they will last for a long time but I don't see them lasting forever. You also have the same problem that most earbuds share, they don't always stay in your ear securely and can fall out. Both problems can be addressed by purchasing aftermarket products but I wish that wasn't a necessity.
